title: nonnozeus
author: nonnozeus
content: after not having received any response in 2 months and no payment in my wallet I think this casino is to be declared a scam and also warn other users of the forum14 Jun 22Withdrawal-2560.3705916:03 - 16:08never received in my wallet after sending code via SMS

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: That's not the way how to create a scam accusation. Check out how some of the other members have done it in this sub board or follow the instructions in the Scam Report Format. You need to provide proof that you got scammed to be taken seriously. No one is going to tag anyone or declare them as scammers without evidence of wrongdoing.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: You should at least detail the chronology of all your bets until this withdrawal request is made. I saw that this casino is giving out free spins every day in the announcement thread. Are you sure you are not abusing it?

comments.author: TwitchySeal
comments.body: You forgot to explain what happened.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: nonnozeus on August 11, 2022, 06:53:42 AMafter not having received any response in 2 months and no payment in my wallet I think this casino is to be declared a scam and also warn other users of the forum14 Jun 22Withdrawal-2560.3705916:03 - 16:08never received in my wallet after sending code via SMSThis is not acceptable you are not proving anything, this is just hearsay if you cannot prove it by screenshots and transactions this is useless this forum only accepts valid accusations based on what you can show us not what you can copy paste.There's another accusation on 8bet.io but unfortunately, the guy who posted this other accusation did not post anything like youhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5239937.msg54208472#msg54208472

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: They are active in this thread every day, so you can start making some noise there and see if it works: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5129857.msg60730093;topicseen although I'm not sure if it's a bot posting or a real human.There was a guy complaining about this casino a while back (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5239937.0), but like yourself, he didn't provide any proof whatsoever to be taken seriously.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: nonnozeus on August 11, 2022, 06:53:42 AMafter not having received any response in 2 months and no payment in my wallet I think this casino is to be declared a scam and also warn other users of the forumI am not defending 8bet website and I never used them but you need to post some screenshots and follow instructions and format for posting.You should post something like your balance, your bets and conversations you had with their support team in chat or emails.

comments.author: nonnozeus
comments.body: Quote from: notblox1 on August 11, 2022, 08:22:50 PMQuote from: nonnozeus on August 11, 2022, 06:53:42 AMafter not having received any response in 2 months and no payment in my wallet I think this casino is to be declared a scam and also warn other users of the forumI am not defending 8bet website and I never used them but you need to post some screenshots and follow instructions and format for posting.You should post something like your balance, your bets and conversations you had with their support team in chat or emails.evidence of what?    my payment history shows that the LTC have been transferred but I have no other indication except that nothing has ever arrived in my wallethow do you do or post conversations with them if they don't reply to any mail to any telegram message and they don't have a live chat?just the fact of not responding with their support should indicate that this site is certainly not reliable for depositing and playing

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: nonnozeus on August 13, 2022, 09:28:25 AMQuote from: notblox1 on August 11, 2022, 08:22:50 PMQuote from: nonnozeus on August 11, 2022, 06:53:42 AMafter not having received any response in 2 months and no payment in my wallet I think this casino is to be declared a scam and also warn other users of the forumI am not defending 8bet website and I never used them but you need to post some screenshots and follow instructions and format for posting.You should post something like your balance, your bets and conversations you had with their support team in chat or emails.evidence of what?    my payment history shows that the LTC have been transferred but I have no other indication except that nothing has ever arrived in my wallethow do you do or post conversations with them if they don't reply to any mail to any telegram message and they don't have a live chat?just the fact of not responding with their support should indicate that this site is certainly not reliable for depositing and playingDo you not know how to screenshot? Screenshot it and upload it to pic sharing site like IMGUR, we have no way of knowing if you're telling the truth, this is not a hearsay section we must base it on facts like screenshots of transaction records like your deposit, screenshot your proof that you send them an email with the date highlighted so you can prove that you indeed created a ticket for your issue, you have to show something not just words.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: nonnozeus on August 13, 2022, 09:28:25 AMevidence of what? Evidence of your claims needs to be supported by screenshots and images that confirms your words.You didn't make correct scam accusation post and nobody is going to trust your words with your reputation and newbie rank in forum.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: nonnozeus on August 13, 2022, 09:28:25 AMevidence of what?    my payment history shows that the LTC have been transferred but I have no other indication except that nothing has ever arrived in my walletEvidence to show that you weren't paid what you attempted to withdraw and that they weren't replying to your emails. What's so hard with that?Screenshots of your Deposit and withdrawal historiesyour address to with you were withdrawing to in order to verify via and explorer that you received nothing

comments.author: khaled0111
comments.body: Quote from: RikandMorty1 on August 11, 2022, 01:03:00 PMThey are active in this thread every day, so you can start making some noise there and see if it works: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5129857.msg60730093;topicseen although I'm not sure if it's a bot posting or a real human.If you have a complaint or a suggestion, Â you have to post it on the announcement thread. Here is the link to 8bet's Ann thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3038024.480I noticed that OP posted there multiple times but he didn't get any response which was expected as it seems they are using a bot to post updates and promotions and never interact with other members.Quote from: logfiles on August 13, 2022, 08:11:55 PMScreenshots of your Deposit and withdrawal historiesHe didn't make any deposit. He won that money from free spins which makes me wonder if he has completed the wagering requirement before he made the withdrawal request!

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: khaled0111 on August 14, 2022, 05:38:20 PMHe didn't make any deposit. He won that money from free spins which makes me wonder if he has completed the wagering requirement before he made the withdrawal request!he said the LTC has been transferred but nothing arrived in his wallet. so I assume that the wagering requirement was met and that's why the request was approved. the OP's case would be easily understood if he can just provide the necessary evidence supporting his claim and properly explain what exactly happened.Quotemy payment history shows that the LTC have been transferred but I have no other indication except that nothing has ever arrived in my wallet
